name: True Pinball
overview: This is True Pinball... This is attention to detail on every level. This is ball physics: table design: 2D and 3D views: six ball multiballs: video modes and incredible music. This is an experience heightened by the excitement of accurate pinball simulation. Prepare yourself for the speed - prepare yourself for the shock - this is True Pinball. True Pinball is a console version of Pinball Illusions that has 4 different tables, named "Extreme Sports", "Vikings - The Tales", "Ricochet" and "Babewatch".
